plugin.index.title: Huawei CodeArts demo plugin main page
plugin.index.description: This is the plugin frontend page
plugin.leftPanel.introduction: This extension provides examples of how to invoke or register various dialogs.
plugin.leftPanel.newProjectIntroduction: 1.A panel is added to the New Project dialog box. Generally, extension of the project-wizard type register pop-up windows here.
plugin.leftPanel.customDialogIntroductio: 2.Register the standard pop-up dialog. Here are several examples:
(1)The default pop-up window cannot be dragged, the size cannot be changed, and there is no mask layer.The default width and height are 500 x 300.
(2)draggable, resizeable, there are masks.The default width and height are 500 x 300.
(3)The customized width and height are 600 x 400. The display position is (300, 300). There is no titlebar. There are masks. Press esc to exit the pop-up window.
(4)Adaptive width and height based on content
